measures.name: Title_Waterfall
measures.expression:
"Actual "&selectedvalue(Operating_Parameter[Parameter Name])&
                IF(SELECTEDVALUE(Operating_Parameter[Parameter Name]) = "Customer Fines"," vs Last Year "," vs Plan ")
                &selectedvalue(CG_PeriodSelection[Period])&" "&selectedvalue(Dim_DateSlicer[P_YearPeriod])
